website_summaries.verdict: Use to create contours, highlights and shadows across your entire face. A few of the fairest found the bronzers a tad dark.
pros: These highly-pigmented hues are clay-based, so they blend unbelievably well
Bronzers may be too dark for customers with the lightest skin
cons: Some users said their palette arrived in poor condition

customer_reviews.title: I Am SO Happy!
customer_reviews.text: After reading other reviews I was worried that it would be messed up, but it came absolutely perfect! Some people were saying that it looked scratched up, but it's supposed to look slightly distressed, so don't worry! As for the colors, they are CRAZY pigmented! I barely had any on the brush and my contour came out looking like I had mud on my face, lol! So use just a TINY bit when first applying it! It's real Tarte and AWESOME!
customer_reviews.author: Mean Jean McCormack

customer_reviews.title: This pallet is life.
customer_reviews.text: Ummmm, LOVE! I feel like maybe the eye colors (the small squares) maybe don't stay on as well as I want, but the bronzer and the contour colors are absolutely perfect, I use them everyday. This is my go to pallet, and every color is gorgeous, I'm auburn hair with fair skin and blue eyes, and this pallet is life. I get hit on at the grocery store when I'm solely wearing this pallet. Just saying.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Williams

customer_reviews.title: A good collection of shadows and shaping
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Not real good for travel unless rubber band closure because of no snap lid but it's good for home use.a very good collection of eye shadows. Arrived very well packaged
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Delodder

customer_reviews.title: Looooove
customer_reviews.text: I loooove this. It was cheaper on amazon than the actual website. It smells like vanilla/chocolate. I love a neutral pallet because I can use it for contour and eyeshadow. I don’t like over the top dramatic makeup. This pallet is good for everyday wear. My face looks so smooth. This brand does not look like the cheap department store brands. This pallet last for hours and I have been complimented on my makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great colors!
customer_reviews.text: I've never really splurged on eye makeup before (too frugal) but I saved up enough Amazon points and decided to go off someone's recommendation to get this palette, and I'm glad I did! I'm loving it so far! The shades are very natural looking which I love (not really into that shimmer stuff) and I've been using it to experiment with different fall looks that all look AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the best pallet I got from tarte not only can you ...
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best pallet I got from tarte not only can you use this on the face but eyes as well and eyebrows even though some of the bronzer shades are dark keep in mind you can use it for eye-shadow the bronzer can also be used to contour great for traveling ladies
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Nice natural colora
customer_reviews.text: They were ok. did not impress me but colors were nice and neutral.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Hiebendahl

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: The box the palate came in had a large dent in it and transferred to the actual palate. The chevron pattern was worn and looked as if it had been used for a while. The colors inside were a little dusty like they lost a little product but overall still intact. Big bummer about the exterior though.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Liebsock

customer_reviews.title: Perfect warm tones
customer_reviews.text: Great warm pallet. Only negative is doesn’t have a built in spot for brush n is cardboard. So maybe not best for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! The shipping was quicker than it estimated, and the packaging was amazing! It had two boxes and lots of wrap to ensure the colors didn't smash. The desert color turned out a little more brown than pink, as it looked in the picture. But, overall I was very pleased with this product. 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A warm orange would have been nice in the pallet and a shimmer. Overall awesome pallet.
customer_reviews.author: Leelee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: gave it to my sis as a gift - she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Colors are so nice
customer_reviews.text: These colors are just what I like. They go on very smoothly and are easy to blend.
customer_reviews.author: Horserider

customer_reviews.title: Love tarts makeup
customer_reviews.text: Package was a bit damaged. Other than that it’s a great makeup palette.
customer_reviews.author: LexiLou

customer_reviews.title: Love the palatte!
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty palatte. Love the colors and how smooth it goes on.
customer_reviews.author: stacey

customer_reviews.title: Be aware
customer_reviews.text: It came faster then I expected. Only probably was mirror was broken and some shades messed up.
customer_reviews.author: Blanca Rios

customer_reviews.title: Came in perfect condition and I swatched one and it's super pigmented
customer_reviews.text: Can't wait to use it! Came in perfect condition and I swatched one and it's super pigmented!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Page Turner

customer_reviews.title: ... had ordered this palette by accident but now i love it so much
customer_reviews.text: i had ordered this palette by accident but now i love it so much! i really think this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Cardenas

customer_reviews.title: It was okay.
customer_reviews.text: I have one I got from Sephora and doesn't match up to it.
customer_reviews.author: May

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful and smells great. Nothing bad to say. Seller did good.
customer_reviews.author: LPanko

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC
customer_reviews.text: Very good, the pigment is fantastic, shades are nice and buttery. The shades themselves blend out beautifully. A very universal pallet
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Appeared to be used and not new
customer_reviews.text: The colors were great however the package look used. There were scuff marks and makeup on the outside. And inside packaging!
customer_reviews.author: TIna Davis

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Terrible condition. Looks like it was used before and resold. So unhappy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: This item was all scuffed up from the outside to the casing and even the directions. They even were torn. Also the makeup was smudged. This was supposed to be a gift and I have to return it and buy again before Christmas. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor LaFleur

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This brush is fabulous!! I love it!! I use it for applying mineral foundation and it works better than the brushes that came with the foundation! It is dense and soft!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephers

customer_reviews.title: Bristles fall out
customer_reviews.text: Within a few months, the bristles began falling out of the brush. I would have bristles all over my face before I left the house. I would not recommend this item. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie L. Metz

customer_reviews.title: Best accidental purchase, ever!
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally purchased this product after forgetting to remove it from my cart. I had contacted them before shipping to let them know the dilemma and they were extremely understanding. When the palette arrived, as among the options was to keep the palette, it was better then expected. The colors are more of a cool-neutral palette. All of the eye shadows are beautiful, however two of the bronzers are a little too dark for me right now, but will probably get used closer to the summer time. The big mirror in the palette is perfect for traveling. This palette is perfect for short vacations, as it provides 3 different natural shadow looks, and 3 different bronzers/contour colors.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Dacey

customer_reviews.title: Great options for eyes and brows
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and many options. They are earth-toned matte colors. The bronzers did not work for me, actually looked like dirt on my cheekbones (didn’t know that could be a thing) but you can use the bronzers for eyeshadow. Can use the shadow colors for brows and eyeliner. Overall good selection all-in-one with many combinations for eyes. My skin is light to medium and slight olive-toned for reference.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

customer_reviews.title: ARRIVED BROKEN SHADES POWDER EVERYWHERE RETURNED
customer_reviews.text: Broken cracked shadows — NOT HAPPY! I opted out of doing the replacement option because I figured the other ones would be like that as well
customer_reviews.author: Makeupby_laurenjade

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This palette is awesome. It is really smooth and blendable. I was really impressed with it. I can use it to do my whole face. Nice for travel too.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: ... it was the original and it came packaged really good. Over all love this pallet
customer_reviews.text: Was a little skeptical because was scared it was going to be a knock off of the original but it was the original and it came packaged really good. Over all love this pallet! Pigmented, blends really good and smells amazing
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Nice muted colors
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors and the consistency. The eyeshadows don't crease on me.
customer_reviews.author: L.A.

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it. You know you want to.
customer_reviews.text: The best make up ever! Color is amazing. I ordered one and this one was for my daughter. The colors are highly pigmented and requires very little, all the shaded blend and work well together. This makeup is professional level and it smells so great.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri A. Fincham

customer_reviews.title: This is the real deal!
customer_reviews.text: Authentic palette from Tarte, and the color payoff is incredible! Each shade is a velvety matte, and they blend incredibly well. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Love this palette
customer_reviews.text: Love this palette, i use It every day! Can grab lots of product though, so be gentle with the powders!!
customer_reviews.author: Alanna D

customer_reviews.title: Typical Tarte—good quality makeup
customer_reviews.text: I saw other reviewers complain about their product being used or perhaps not authentic but I had no problems with that here. Good color payoff/pigmentation with little fallout.
customer_reviews.author: SPCWADE

customer_reviews.title: I got a smoking deal! Love Tart
customer_reviews.text: Great buy on this! Colors are amazing fun. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dyane Silva

customer_reviews.title: A perfect travel pallet
customer_reviews.text: I retired my shade and light eye pallet with this! A perfect travel pallet! I’m an nc42 in mac and all the face shaping colors are beautiful on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: aurora

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much! This blends easily and I love all the natural colors. Plus it smells amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Terran

customer_reviews.title: Perfect natural mattes!
customer_reviews.text: I love this palette, it’s so versiltile and I’m glad amazon still had it in stock after the major makeup stores stopped carrying it!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: One of my faves!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great palette, all matte no shimmer especially great for beginners. Blends nice and is great to mix with other palettes!
customer_reviews.author: 💕 Thaleia💕

customer_reviews.title: What a great price on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: What a great price on Amazon. I previously purchased in store for about 10 dollars more - then I lost it. :(. Found it here and purchased it without any hesitation. My makeup goes on perfectly every time. Just make sure you get some brush cleaner because (no fault to the brush) because it can change the way the makeup applies. I love this brush!
customer_reviews.author: amanda g.

customer_reviews.title: Flawless
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful brush and applies foundation nicely. I use this with the Tarte Amazonian Clay foundation for a flawless finish.
customer_reviews.author: C. Owens

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical but fell in love first time I used it
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical but fell in love first time I used it. Very soft and applies makeup quickly and beautifully! Sorry beauty blender, I think I have a new favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Great for fondation
customer_reviews.text: so dense and very soft. Great for fondation, medium to full coverage.
customer_reviews.author: melissa rohr

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Item came packaged new and us gorgeous!! Love this brush bc it gives me an airbrushed look.
customer_reviews.author: LINA

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful well made brush
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful well made brush! Couldn't be happier! Wish it came wrapped better that's all I can really complain about
customer_reviews.author: Teethingbabyissues

customer_reviews.title: Is this even a legit tarte brush...
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it 0 stars I would. My brush arrived all smashed and the bristlesall ugly. It didnt come wrapped at all. It was just rolling around in the shipping box. Tart brushes come in their cute boxes..
customer_reviews.author: Maraiah

product_meta.title: Tarte Clay Play Face Shaping Palette
product_meta.description: Tarte Clay Play Face Shaping Palette
